description: Nonzero coefficients in one of the 5-adic expansions of sqrt(-1).
references: Kurt Mahler, Introduction to p-adic numbers and their functions. Cambridge Tracts in Mathematics, 76. Cambridge University Press, Cambridge-New York, 1971. See pp. 35ff.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from Antonio G. Astudillo (afg_astudillo(AT)hotmail.com) and Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jun 15 2001
Name corrected by _Robert Israel_ at suggestion of _Wolfdieter Lang_, Mar 04 2016
